description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

+15 vs Reflex; 1d10+2 necrotic damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Arcane, Force, Implement

Standard

Ranged 20; +19 vs Reflex; 2d4+3 force damage (crit 3d6+14).

At-Will ✦ Fear, Psychic

Standard

Ranged 5; +15 vs Will; 2d6+3 psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses (save ends).

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fear, Psychic

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +15 vs Will; 2d8+3 psychic damage, and the target is pushed 5 squares and is immobilized (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Arcane, Implement, Radiant

Standard

Close blast 5; +19 vs Will; 1d6+6 radiant damage (crit 3d6+12), and the target is dazed until the end of Jaccobux's next turn.

Encounter ✦ Arcane, Force, Implement

Standard

Ranged 10; +19 vs Fortitude; 2d10+6 force damage (crit 3d6+26), and target is pushed 3 squares and knocked prone.

Daily ✦ Arcane, Cold, Conjuration, Implement

Standard

Sustain Minor

Jaccobux conjures a 5-foot tall hand of ice in an unoccupied square within range, and the hand attacks one target adjacent to it; ranged 20; +19 vs Reflex; 2d8+6 cold damage (crit 3d6 + 22) and the target is grabbed (until escape, DC 23). As a move action, Jaccobux can move the hand up to 6 squares.

When Jaccobux sustains the hand, a target it has grabbed takes 1d8 + 6 cold damage. As a standard action, Jaccobux can attack another target with the hand, but it must release a target it has grabbed.

Encounter ✦ Implement

Free

Jaccobux gains a +2 bonus to a single attack roll.

Daily ✦ Arcane, Illusion

Minor

Until the end of the encounter, Jaccobux gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses, and enemies 5 or more squares away cannot see him.

system.biography:
HP 182; Bloodied 91
Resist insubstantial Immune disease, poison 		Init +8 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 25Fort 25Ref 25Will 26
Speed fly 6 (hover); phasing
Ability ScoresStr 14 (+8)
Con 13 (+7)		Dex 15 (+8)
Int 17 (+9)		Wis 14 (+8)
Cha 17 (+9)
Languages Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Elven, Primordial
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +14Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 18 | Insight 18

Equipment magic wand +3 .

Standard
